verses.verse: And <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H1293>blessing,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4194>death.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H4480>Sinai,<s%> <S%H5514><s%> and rose <S%H2224>up<s%> from <S%H4480>Seir<s%> <S%H8165><s%> unto them; he shined <S%H3313>forth<s%> from <S%H4480>mount<s%> <S%H2022><s%> <S%H6290>Paran,<s%> and he <S%H857>came<s%> with ten <S%H4480>thousands<s%> <S%H7233><s%> of <S%H6944>saints:<s%> from his right <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3225><s%> went a <S%H784>fiery<s%> <S%H1881>law<s%> for them.

Yea, <S%H637><s%> he <S%H2245>loved<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6918>saints<s%> are in thy <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> sat <S%H8497>down<s%> at thy <S%H7272>feet;<s%> every one shall <S%H5375>receive<s%> of thy <S%H4480>words.<s%> <S%H1703><s%>
Moses <S%H4872><s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us a <S%H8451>law,<s%> even the <S%H4181>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H6952>congregation<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

And he <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3484>Jeshurun,<s%> when the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> and the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>
Let <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H4191>die;<s%> and let not his <S%H4962>men<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4557>few.<s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> is the blessing of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> him <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H5971>people:<s%> let his <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H7227>sufficient<s%> for him; and <S%H1961>be<s%> thou a <S%H5828>help<s%> to him from his <S%H4480>enemies.<s%> <S%H6862><s%>

And of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> Let thy <S%H8550>Thummim<s%> and thy <S%H224>Urim<s%> be with thy <S%H2623>holy<s%> <S%H376>one,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thou didst <S%H5254>prove<s%> at <S%H4532>Massah,<s%> and with whom thou didst <S%H7378>strive<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah;<s%>

Who <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%> and to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> him; <S%H3808>neither<s%> did he <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> his own <S%H1121>children:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they have <S%H8104>observed<s%> thy <S%H565>word,<s%> and <S%H5341>kept<s%> thy <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

They shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> thy <S%H8451>law:<s%> they shall <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H6988>incense<s%> <S%H639>before<s%> thee, and whole burnt <S%H3632>sacrifice<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Bless, <S%H1288><s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> his <S%H2428>substance,<s%> and <S%H7521>accept<s%> the <S%H6467>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands:<s%> smite <S%H4272>through<s%> the <S%H4975>loins<s%> of them that rise <S%H6965>against<s%> him, and of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> him, <S%H4480>that<s%> they rise not <S%H6965>again.<s%>

And of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3039>beloved<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> him; and the LORD shall <S%H2653>cover<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long, and he shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> his <S%H3802>shoulders.<s%>

And of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be his <S%H776>land,<s%> for the precious <S%H4480>things<s%> <S%H4022><s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> for the <S%H4480>dew,<s%> <S%H2919><s%> and for the <S%H4480>deep<s%> <S%H8415><s%> that <S%H7257>coucheth<s%> <S%H8478>beneath,<s%>

And for the <S%H4480>precious<s%> <S%H4022><s%> <S%H8393>fruits<s%> brought forth by the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and for the precious <S%H4480>things<s%> <S%H4022><s%> put <S%H1645>forth<s%> by the <S%H3391>moon,<s%>

And for the chief <S%H4480>things<s%> <S%H7218><s%> of the <S%H6924>ancient<s%> <S%H2042>mountains,<s%> and for the precious <S%H4480>things<s%> <S%H4022><s%> of the <S%H5769>lasting<s%> <S%H1389>hills,<s%>

And for the precious <S%H4480>things<s%> <S%H4022><s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H4393>fullness<s%> thereof, and for the good <S%H7522>will<s%> of him that <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H5572>bush:<s%> let the blessing <S%H935>come<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and upon the top of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of him that was <S%H5139>separated<s%> from his <S%H251>brethren.<s%>

His <S%H1926>glory<s%> is like the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of his <S%H7794>bullock,<s%> and his <S%H7161>horns<s%> are like the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of <S%H7214>unicorns:<s%> with them he shall <S%H5055>push<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> to the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> are the ten <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> are the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>
And of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8055>Rejoice,<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> in thy going <S%H3318>out;<s%> and, <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> in thy <S%H168>tents.<s%>

They shall <S%H7121>call<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> they shall <S%H2076>offer<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they shall <S%H3243>suck<s%> of the <S%H8228>abundance<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and of <S%H8226>treasures<s%> <S%H2934>hid<s%> in the <S%H2344>sand.<s%>

And of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be he that <S%H7337>enlargeth<s%> <S%H1410>Gad:<s%> he <S%H7931>dwelleth<s%> as a <S%H3833>lion,<s%> and <S%H2963>teareth<s%> the <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H637>with<s%> the crown of the <S%H6936>head.<s%>

And he <S%H7200>provided<s%> the first <S%H7225>part<s%> for himself, <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> in a <S%H2513>portion<s%> of the <S%H2710>lawgiver,<s%> was he <S%H5603>seated;<s%> and he <S%H857>came<s%> with the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he <S%H6213>executed<s%> the <S%H6666>justice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1835>Dan<s%> is a <S%H738>lion's<s%> <S%H1482>whelp:<s%> he shall <S%H2187>leap<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

And of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H7649>satisfied<s%> with <S%H7522>favor,<s%> and <S%H4392>full<s%> with the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3423>possess<s%> thou the <S%H3220>west<s%> and the <S%H1864>south.<s%>

And of <S%H836>Asher<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> Let <S%H836>Asher<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> with <S%H4480>children;<s%> <S%H1121><s%> let him <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7521>acceptable<s%> to his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and let him <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H7272>foot<s%> in <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
Thy <S%H4515>shoes<s%> shall be <S%H1270>iron<s%> and <S%H5178>brass;<s%> and as thy <S%H3117>days,<s%> so shall thy <S%H1679>strength<s%> be.

There is <S%H369>none<s%> like unto the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H3484>Jeshurun,<s%> who rideth <S%H7392>upon<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> in thy <S%H5828>help,<s%> and in his <S%H1346>excellency<s%> on the <S%H7834>sky.<s%>

The <S%H6924>eternal<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is thy <S%H4585>refuge,<s%> and <S%H4480>underneath<s%> <S%H8478><s%> are the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2220>arms:<s%> and he shall thrust <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee; and shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8045>Destroy<s%> them.

Israel <S%H3478><s%> then shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%> <S%H910>alone:<s%> the <S%H5869>fountain<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall be <S%H413>upon<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1715>corn<s%> and <S%H8492>wine;<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> his <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall drop <S%H6201>down<s%> <S%H2919>dew.<s%>

Happy <S%H835><s%> art thou, O <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is like unto <S%H3644>thee,<s%> O <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of thy <S%H5828>help,<s%> and <S%H834>who<s%> is the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of thy <S%H1346>excellency!<s%> and thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall be found <S%H3584>liars<s%> unto thee; and <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H1869>tread<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their high <S%H1116>places.<s%>
